question: Which country is hosting the 2017 Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation (APEC) summit?
explanation: The 2017 Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation (APEC) summit has started in Danang, Vietnam with theme "Creating New Dynamism, Fostering a Shared Future" on November 10, 2017. The 2-day summit will gives an opportunity to tout the benefits of global free trade.
